00040 struct WaveformData {
00041         int32 usecTime;
00042         float amplitude;
00043         float slope;
00044 };
00045 
00053 OBJECT_DLL(Waveform)
00054 class Waveform: public WaveformInterface, public GCNamedObject, public HttpInterface {
00055 OBJECT_DLL_STUFF(Waveform)
00056 
00057 private:
00059     int32         current;
00061     WaveformData* waveform;
00063     int32         rounding;
00065     int32         numberOfWindows;
00066 
00067 private:
00069     float                minimumValue;
00071     float                maximumValue;
00072 
00073 private:
00075     SVGGraph             svgGraph;
00076 
00077 
00078 public:
00080     Waveform() {
00081         current         = 0;
00082         waveform        = NULL;
00083         minimumValue    = -1e16;
00084         maximumValue    = +1e16;
00085         rounding        = 0;
00086         numberOfWindows = 0;
00087     }
00088 
00090     virtual ~Waveform() {
00091         if (waveform != NULL) free((void *&)waveform);
00092     }
00093 
00099     virtual bool ObjectLoadSetup(ConfigurationDataBase& cdbData, StreamInterface *err);
00100 
00111     virtual float GetValue(int32 usecTime);
00112 
00114     inline virtual void Reset() {
00115         current = 0;
00116     }
00117 
00118     virtual bool ProcessHttpMessage(HttpStream &hStream);
00119 
00120     void HTMLInfo(HttpStream &hStream);
00121 
00122     inline WaveformData* GetWaveformDataPointer() {
00123         return waveform;
00124     }
00125 
00126     inline int32 NumberOfWindows() {
00127         return numberOfWindows;
00128     }

00130 };
